text: Mood Media is the global leader in
in-store customer experience we are 24 7
operation we have operations all over
the world and so we need our system up
all the time we run Oracle EBS it's an
on-premise solution and we had it on a
private hosting environment that
environment was very expensive to
maintain it was not scalable and we were
unable to be flexible with you know
rolling out different solutions or
ramping up instances so we're looking to
leverage some of the modern Cloud
infrastructure Solutions out there but
also to be able to save some money and
and experience better performance and so
we we started looking at different
solutions and ended up picking AWS cost
was a factor but not the primary factor
that reliability was uptime was the
number one driver for us when we moved
to AWS and we changed our operating
system our experience with Oracle
actually improved before we would spend
a lot of time trying to figure out well
what where is it where is the problem
now we don't really have that so
everything has been easier to deal with
Oracle support quite frankly since we
moved to AWS and Linux you know I was
talking to one of our our business
leaders in the break room a little while
ago and um and I said do you remember a
year ago when when Oracle used to go
down all the time and and she said yeah
I can't believe the change that we've
had since we've moved to AWS the
system's never down again productivity
is huge this move into AWS has probably
been one of the best decisions that that
mood is made we have also subsequently
purchased redshift
uh and Tableau as our bi solution and uh
you know plugging redshift in with our
Amazon account and connecting that to
EBS has been has been very easy you have
to have a data Lake like redshift and a
and a optimization tool like like
Tableau to really start seeing what's
happening with your customers what's
happening uh in your systems and so
having that visibility really for the
first time ever is huge and you know our
leaders can have a conversation with the
data we're able to do that nimbly
quickly and quite frankly at a cost that
is much lower than some of the other
other solutions that we had before every
month we we run invoices and if you if
you think about it over 300 000
subscriptions that we bill every month
and so for the system to Chuck through
those
it takes time well that time has been
cut down I would say probably in half
that it takes the processor to run now
so just things like that getting those
invoices generated quicker and out
quicker has been a big plus we have an
outstanding partner apps associates they
created a detailed project plan for the
migration and their offshore teams are
as good as their onshore teams which is
pretty rare in an I.T business so you
know 24 7 we are fully taken care of
naps Associated Premier AWS Consulting
partner we're also a AWS managed
services provider so we can help
customers all the way from inception
idea all the way to migration
optimization run and maintain and then
after they're on the AWS platform how to
modernize those applications once
they've moved them on to AWS we
consulted them guided them we looked at
the capacity we looked at their
licensing we optimized all of their
Oracle Enterprise workloads mapped it
into AWS and showed them how they could
successfully run their existing Oracle
Enterprise applications on AWS
we're constantly doing major projects
and we did an acquisition well sometimes
when you do these projects you need to
spin up another development instance
quickly but you only need it for a
couple weeks
we could never do that before well with
AWS spinning that stuff up and apps
Associates is real easy and we'll use in
essence for a couple weeks and then
we'll shut it back down and so having
that scalability and flexibility is huge
for us and the other thing I love about
AWS is
they are constantly rolling out new and
more powerful machines that apps
associates they press a button and we're
on and we don't spend any more money the

enable the business to get more and more
